name: Super Mario 64 DS
description: Super Mario 64 DS is a platform game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS handheld game console. It is the first installment in the Super Mario 64 series to be released on a handheld console, and the first Super Mario 64 game to be released in North America. The game was released in Japan on November 21, 2004, and in North America on March 21, 2005.
author: Nintendo
